citation.article-title: Description of Olleya aquimaris sp. nov., isolated from seawater, and emended description of the genus Olleya Mancuso Nichols et al. 2005
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Olleya Mancuso Nichols et al. 2005
The description of the genus Olleya is as given by Mancuso Nichols et al. (2005) with the following amendments.
Common major polar lipids are an unidentified aminolipid and an unidentified lipid.
The DNA G+C content is 35–42 mol% (by HPLC).
